#include<string.h>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int c[201];
int main() {
	string s;
	int t=0,n=0;
	cin>>t;
	while(t){
	    int count=0;
	    cin>>s;
	    	    memset(c,0,sizeof(c));
	    for(int i=0;i<s.length();i++)
	    {
	     if(c[s[i]]==0){count++;c[s[i]]=1;}
	     else c[s[i]]=0;
	    }
	    cout<<count<<endl;t--;
	}
	
	return 0;
}
